newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-ASX queries Solution over report.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-ASX queries Solution over report.

text.p: Software group Solution 6 Holdings Ltd said on Monday it was in talks with several parties over future product launches and its Internet service provider unit Access One.
Solution 6 said it has planned the development of software products which combine the group's software experience together with the recent internet technology gained from Access One.

"These new products are classified as 'intranet' solutions and are applicable world-wide and will be released via the extensive distribution channels of the group in the future," Solution 6 said in reply to an Australian Stock Exchange query.
"Solution 6 has been in contact with a number of internet related companies both in Australia and overseas that would be able to assist in this planned expansion," Solution 6 said.
Some of these companies have inquired as to possible equity or similar participation with Solution 6, it said.

"These discussions have not led at this time to any specific conclusions concerning the formation of any strategic alliances, equity participation or the sale of the business of Access One Pty Ltd," it said.
The ASX query follows an article in the Australian Financial Review newspaper about the possible sale of Access One.
Solution 6 shares fell 11 cents to A$1.25 on Monday.
